messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re:donkey Konga
messages.msgSnippet: Tomorrow s my birthday and my mother-in-law sent me some money in her birthday card.  I bought Donkey Konga!!!  It is so fun.  I m waiting my turn again but
messages.messageBody:
Tomorrow's my birthday and my mother-in-law sent me some money in her
birthday card. I bought Donkey Konga!!! It is so fun. I'm waiting my turn again
but it's a hit with the whole family.

I'm turning 52......yikes!!! Better go play "Wild Thing" again...:-)

Gail


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re:donkey Konga
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Sandra, You just gave me a big idea for a holiday gift for Riley. He loves gaming and has asked for drums and to get both in one sounds so good. Thanks and
messages.messageBody:
Hi Sandra,

You just gave me a big idea for a holiday gift for Riley. He loves gaming and has asked for drums and to get both in one sounds so good. Thanks and I am glad I read today, it's been a long while since I have had the time to sit and read unschooling posts.

Mary Hickman
